Description: Validate subjectivity text is concatenated to static wording, no extra space (manual entry).
Step Description: 1. Login and navigate to Financial Lines subjectivity input. 2. In the subjectivity field, type: SubjectivityTest 3. Save and review the display.
Expected Result: Concatenated string is 'SubjectivityTest[STATIC]', with no space between entered text and static wording.

Description: Validate concatenation when subjectivity is pasted in, no extra space.
Step Description: 1. Copy 'PasteTest' to clipboard. 2. Paste into subjectivity field. 3. Save and review output.
Expected Result: Result is 'PasteTest[STATIC]' with no space between pasted text and static wording.

Test Case Name: Empty Subjectivity Shows Static Wording Only
Description: If subjectivity is empty, only static wording is shown, no orphaned space.
Step Description: 1. Leave subjectivity input empty. 2. Save and check output display.
Expected Result: Output is only '[STATIC]'; no leading spaces or blank lines.

Description: Special characters in subjectivity do not cause extra space or misformatting.
Step Description: 1. Enter 'Subj@#$%^^&*()' into subjectivity. 2. Save and view display.
Expected Result: Output is 'Subj@#$%^^&*()[STATIC]' with no space or error.

Description: Max allowed subjectivity length concatenates correctly with static wording.
Step Description: 1. Input exactly max chars allowed in subjectivity (e.g. 255 chars). 2. Save and view output.
Expected Result: Max-length subjectivity concatenates directly to '[STATIC]' with no extra spaces; display remains aligned.

Description: Test system trims trailing spaces before static wording concatenation.
Step Description: 1. Enter 'TrailingSpace ' (with trailing space) in subjectivity. 2. Save and check display.

Description: Test system trims leading spaces before concatenation.
Step Description: 1. Enter ' LeadingSpace' (with leading space) in subjectivity. 2. Save and check display.
Expected Result: Leading space is trimmed: 'LeadingSpace[STATIC]', NOT ' LeadingSpace[STATIC]'.

Test Case Name: Multiple Spaces Inside Are Preserved Only Internally
Description: Test that multiple internal spaces are kept, but no new space is added before static wording.
Step Description: 1. Enter 'Multiple   Spaces' (triple space between words) in subjectivity. 2. Save and review display.
Expected Result: Internal spaces kept: 'Multiple   Spaces[STATIC]'; no extra space before '[STATIC]'.

Description: Verify multiline input is handled with correct concatenation (no space).
Step Description: 1. Enter 'Line1\nLine2' (use Enter/newline between) in subjectivity. 2. Save and view display.
Expected Result: Either: 'Line1 Line2[STATIC]' or linebreak directly before [STATIC] per app design, but no extra space before '[STATIC]'.

Test Case Name: Whitespace Only Does Not Cause Preceding Space
Description: Whitespace-only subjectivity should not appear as leading space before static wording.
Step Description: 1. Enter only spaces in subjectivity (e.g., '   '). 2. Save and check display.
Expected Result: Result is '[STATIC]' only, no leading spaces.
